# flatMap(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a new state, mapping the entitlement value if successful.

## Declaration

```swift
func flatMap<NewValue>(_ transform: (Value) throws -> EntitlementTaskState<NewValue>) rethrows -> EntitlementTaskState<NewValue>
```
